price: 2. (Noé) les dijo: “¡Pueblo mío!, yo soy realmente un claro amonestador
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
